changeSet.author: mdaly
changeSet.comment: Remove the new line character (ASCII 10) from the two specified Tay-Sachs templates (ids 882 and 883).
changeSet.sql: UPDATE `prodlims`.`horizondiseasetemplate` SET `variant` = REPLACE(`variant`, CHAR(10), '') WHERE `templatecode` IN ('No DNA; positive enzyme', 'No DNA; indeterminate enzyme') AND `id` IN (882, 883)
